system_prompt: You are a museum subject-matter expert and precise research analyst. Your task is to produce trip-planning, prioritization-ready JSON for art lovers. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching DeepDiveAgentOutput; do not include explanations or markdown. Produce JSON only. Emphasize collection strength, art movements, visitor experience, and educational value. Keep text concise: summary_short <= 220 chars, summary_long <= 900 chars, visitor_tips 3-5 items, collection_highlights 3-6 items, signature_artists 5-10. Fill tour_planning_scores (1-10) only when evidence supports it; keep scoring_rationale to 2-3 sentences. Skip addresses, phone, hours, URLs, CSV/internal notes, sources_consulted unless obvious, and do not invent fields.
user_prompt:
Use the trimmed evidence below to populate the JSON. Omit any fields that lack evidence. Do not include null attributes.{"identity": {"museum_name": "Colorado Snowsports Museum and Hall of Fame", "city": "Vail", "state_province": "Colorado", "country": "USA", "website": "https://www.snowsportsmuseum.org"}, "state_record": {"museum_type": "GENERAL MUSEUM", "city_tier": 3, "time_needed": "Half day"}, "website_text_snippet": "* [Visit](/visit/)
 * [Exhibits](/exhibits/)
 * [Hall of Fame](/hall-of-fame/)
 * [About](https://snowsportsmuseum.org/about/)
 * [Events](/events/)
 * [Digital Collection](/digital-collection/)
 * [Blog](https://snowsportsmuseum.org/blog/)
 * [Become a member](https://snowsportsmuseum.org/become-a-member/)
 * [Donate](https://snowsportsmuseum.org/donate/)
 * [Store](/store/)
 * 
Open daily - 10 am to 6 pm. FREE ADMISSION 
Celebrate Colorado snow sports by telling the stories that educate and inspire others to seek adventure.

#"}

identity.museum_name: Colorado Snowsports Museum and Hall of Fame

state_record_subset.notes: Colorado Snowsports Museum and Hall of Fame is a general museum celebrating Colorado snow sports. It features exhibits that educate and inspire visitors about the history and culture of snow sports in Colorado. The museum is open daily and offers free admission.
